## S3 Recycling Solutions: Your Hassle-Free E-Waste Solution

Welcome to S3 Recycling Solutions! Thank you for visiting.

We appreciate your interest in our hassle-free e-waste solutions for businesses.

**Meet Our Team**

Our dedicated team members are here to assist you with any questions or needs you may have.

Feel free to reach out to us:

![Rod McDaniel](https://s3rs.com/wp-content/uploads/2024/08/R-McDaniel2-270x300.jpg)

Rod McDanielCEO

rmcdaniel@s3rs.com

1.888.970.S3RS(7377) ext. 222

![Stacy Muth](https://s3rs.com/wp-content/uploads/2023/08/Stacy-1.png)

Stacy MuthChief of Staff

smuth@s3rs.com

1.888.970.S3RS(7377) ext. 243

![Erik Ocheltree](https://s3rs.com/wp-content/uploads/2024/08/Erik-2-Copy.jpg)

Erik OcheltreeChief Revenue Officer

eocheltree@s3rs.com

1.888.970.S3RS(7377) ext. 254

![Rayna Bosemer](https://s3rs.com/wp-content/uploads/2022/08/Rayna.jpg)

Rayna BosemerDirector of Client Services and Logistics

rbosemer@s3rs.com

1.888.970.S3RS(7377) ext. 235

![Nathan Freeman](https://s3rs.com/wp-content/uploads/2023/11/Nathan-web.jpg)

Nathan FreemanDirector of Business Development

nfreeman@s3rs.com

1.888.970.S3RS(7377) ext. 250

![Amber Martocci](https://s3rs.com/wp-content/uploads/2024/08/Amber.png)

Amber MartocciAccount Manager

amrtocci@s3rs.com

1.888.970.S3RS(7377) ext. 255

![Beth Delaney](https://s3rs.com/wp-content/uploads/2024/08/Beth.png)

Beth DelaneyAccount Manager

bdelaney@s3rs.com

1.888.970.S3RS(7377) ext. 244

**About S3 Recycling Solutions**

_ITAD (Information Technology Asset Disposition)_

We provide comprehensive IT asset disposition services that ensure your e-waste is managed securely and responsibly. Our R2, ISO 9001, 14001, and 45001 certifications reflect our commitment to quality and environmental stewardship.

Medical Asset Disposition

We also specialize in the disposal of medical assets, ensuring compliance with all relevant regulations and standards. Trust us to handle your sensitive medical equipment with care and precision.

**Request a Meeting or More Information**

We’d love to discuss how S3 Recycling Solutions can support your business. Please fill out the form below to request a meeting or more information.

## Contact Us

Request a meeting or more information

Enter EmailConfirm Email

Please let us know if you would like to meet or would like more information. Have a question for us? Ask away.
